WorkItem.ClosedComment: We looked into this and it appears the only option is to tell Resharper not to hide the menu. You might be able to file a Resharper issue to have them not hide the menu item when the current document is a TypeScript file?
WorkItem.Description:
Refactor menu entry for typescript does not show up with Resharper enabled.
Weird.
WorkItem.Summary: Refactor menu entry for typescript does not show up with Resharper enabled.
